name: HiBaby Triangle and Diamond Studded Belt Bag
description:
Hi Baby Triangle Studded Belt Bag 
Black (Triangle Studded)  with gold details
Tan (Triangle Studded)  with gold details
Red (Triangle Studded)  with gold details

Hi Baby Diamond Studded Belt Bag 
Black (Diamond Studded)  with gold details
Tan (Diamond Studded)  with gold details
Red (Diamond Studded)  with gold details


-Leopard fabric lining (Red and Black)
- Floral Lining (Tan)
-Magnetic Snap closure
-Adjustable nylon or faux leather belt

:::SIZING:::


SMALL BAG: Approximately 3.25" L x 4.0" W (up to 3-4yrs)
MEDIUM BAG: Approximately 3.5"L x 4.5"W (4 yrs and up)
LARGE BAG: Approximately 5.5"L x 3.5"W (7 yrs and up)

(age is only a suggestion. please choose size you feel most comfortable with)

ADJUSTABLE BELT LENTH: 30/32" 

** All items are handmade to order. Please allow 10-14 business days for processing **This may be shorter depending on demand**

**RUSH SHIPPING OPTIONS ARE AVAILABLE. PLEASE SEE DETAILS UNDER "PRODUCTS >> SHIPPING" TO SELECT**


** NOW ACCEPTING INTERNATIONAL ORDERS **

**CAUTION**
This bag is not a toy and contains small parts; please supervise small children wearing them.

name: ADDITIONAL RUSH SHIPPING CHARGE
description:
TO EXPEDITE YOUR ORDER PLEASE CHOOSE ADDITIONAL SHIPPING 
OPTION BELOW. ALL ORDERS WILL GO OUT VIA USPS 2DAY MAIL.


1. 2 Day Processing - Your order will ship within 2 days of your order date - $15.00

2. 4 Day Processing - Your order will ship within 4 days of your order date - $11.00

3. 6 Day Processing - Your order will ship within 6 days of order date - $5.00
